description: Try our easy to follow Sumac-Roasted Eggplant With Lentils & Tahini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lentil salad,Eggplant,Seafood free,Christmas,Wheat free,Gluten free,Rice,Egg free
name: SumacRoasted Eggplant With Lentils & Tahini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small eggplants, each cut into 8 wedges
1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rings
400g no added salt lentils, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Place eggplant, oil and 2 tsp sumac in a large bowl. Lightly season and toss to evenly coat. Place eggplant onto tray and bake for 30 minutes or until tender and golden.
Toss onion with vinegar and remaining sumac in a bowl. Set aside for 10 minutes to lightly pickle.
Meanwhile, heat rice according to packet instructions and allow to cool slightly. Whisk tahini, lemon juice and 1/4 cup water in a small bowl.
Place rice, lentils, peas, mint, half each of the pomegranate seeds and pepitas in a large bowl, tossing to combine.
Layer eggplant and rice mixture onto a large platter. Scatter over remaining pomegranate, pepitas and extra mint. To serve, top with pickled onion mixture and drizzle over tahini dressing.
